SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package controller

Interface ValidationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdministratorRepository, DoctorRepository, PatientRepository, PharmacistRepository
public interface ValidationInterface
The ValidationInterface interface defines a method for validating user credentials.

Implementing classes should provide a mechanism for validating a user's ID and password, typically to allow authentication of users within the system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    validateCredentials(String id, String password)
    Validates the credentials of a user based on their ID and password.

  • Method Details

    • validateCredentials

      User validateCredentials(String id, String password)
      Validates the credentials of a user based on their ID and password.
      Parameters:
      id - the user ID to validate
      password - the password associated with the user ID
      Returns:
      a User object if the credentials are valid; null if the credentials are invalid
